overview: Bob Ingraham is the inventor of Broadcast International’s CodecSys (14 patents) and Media Management/Digital Signage technologies, guiding the continuous innovation necessary to keep BI’s products ahead of the competition. Mr. Ingraham has 30 years of technical and operational leadership, from startup to large enterprise ventures in California’s Silicon Valley and in Utah. He has broad and deep experience in software engineering, technical management and product development, specializing in scalable Internet-based technologies including multimedia communications, mobile applications, social media, cloud-based services and security. He has been CEO of several startups, the last of which he took public, raising USD $88M in institutional investment. He has worked in senior levels of management and as a consultant for various companies including IBM, Hewlett-Packard, MCI-Worldcom, Litton Systems, Qwest Communications, and Microsoft.
